attributes.action: change the law so you cannot be sent to prison for non payment of TV licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a time when prison numbers have reached an all time high, it is even more absurd that we still lock people up for not paying their TV licence. If someone doesn't pay their credit card bill, the money can be recovered using a country court judgement. Why can't the same be applied to non payment of TV licence?
